quotes: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art -- Stanislaw Jerzy Lec
Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years -- Ausonius
Age is a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it don't matter -- Satchel Paige
Cherish all your happy moments; they make a fine cushion for old age -- Booth Tarkington
Try to keep your soul young and quivering right up to old age -- George Sand
The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age -- Lucille Ball
The age of a woman doesn't mean a thing. The best tunes are played on the oldest fiddles -- Ralph Waldo Emerson
Aging is not lost youth but a new stage of opportunity and strength -- Betty Friedan
Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter -- Mark Twain
Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese -- Luis Bunuel
Forty is the old age of youth; fifty the youth of old age -- Victor Hugo
Youth has no age -- Pablo Picasso
You can't help getting older, but you don't have to get old -- George Burns
I'm very mature for my age, but I'm also innocent in a lot of ways -- Kirsten Dunst
I will never be an old man. To me, old age is always 15 years older than I am -- Francis Bacon
Just remember, once you're over the hill you begin to pick up speed -- Arthur Schopenhauer
Youth is a blunder; Manhood a struggle, Old Age a regret -- Benjamin Disraeli
My love for ice cream emerged at an early age - and has never left! -- Ginger Rogers
Old age and treachery will always beat youth and exuberance -- David Mamet
The trick is growing up without growing old -- Casey Stengel
Love has no age, no limit; and no death -- John Galsworthy
Education is the best provision for old age -- Aristotle
Bad news isn't wine. It doesn't improve with age -- Colin Powell
Age wrinkles the body. Quitting wrinkles the soul -- Douglas MacArthur
Old minds are like old horses; you must exercise them if you wish to keep them in working order -- John Adams
There's a vintage which comes with age and experience -- Jon Bon Jovi
Old age: the crown of life, our play's last act -- Marcus Tullius Cicero
You can fake your age or mask it, but the passion that moves the characters has to be real -- Victoria Abril
When grace is joined with wrinkles, it is adorable. There is an unspeakable dawn in happy old age -- Victor Hugo
Age does not make us childish, as some say; it finds us true children -- James Anthony Froude
The people who live in a golden age usually go around complaining how yellow everything looks -- Randall Jarrell
'Age' is the acceptance of a term of years. But maturity is the glory of years -- Martha Graham
As men get older, the toys get more expensive -- Marvin Davis
Old age is just a record of one's whole life -- Muhammad Ali
Age considers; youth ventures -- Rabindranath Tagore
No matter what age you are, there's a lot of room for learning -- Tony Bennett
In youth we learn; in age we understand -- Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach
Age is no barrier. It's a limitation you put on your mind -- Jackie Joyner-Kersee
Age is whatever you think it is. You are as old as you think you are -- Muhammad Ali
Age does not bring you wisdom, age brings you wrinkles -- Estelle Getty
Where there is age there is evolution, where there is life there is growth -- Anjelica Huston
Youth is wasted on the young. George -- Bernard Shaw
Adults are obsolete children -- Dr. Seuss
A man growing old becomes a child again -- Sophoclese
Some age, others mature -- Sean Connery
None are so old as those who have outlived enthusiasm -- Henry David Thoreau
Dissents speak to a future age -- Ruth Bader Ginsburg
Age is a very high price to pay for maturity -- Tom Stoppard
What Youth deemed crystal, Age finds out was dew -- Robert Browning
Those who love deeply never grow old; they may die of old age, but they die young -- Dorothy Canfield Fisher
The shades of respectability begin to close about the greying head -- Mason Cooley
For me, love is endless, and love has no age limit -- Khalid
With age comes common sense and wisdom -- Nas
We are always the same age inside -- Gertrude Stein
Every man desires to live long, but no man wishes to be old -- Jonathan Swift
It is not how old you are, but how you are old -- Jules Renard
Age does not protect you from love. But love, to some extent, protects you from age -- Jeanne Moreau
Being seventy is not a sin -- Golda Meir
I'm very pleased to be here. Let's face it, at my age I'm very pleased to be anywhere -- George Burns
Age is like love, it cannot be hid -- Thomas Dekker
Forty is the old age of youth, fifty is the youth of old age -- Hosea Ballou
I'm learning a lot about myself being alone, and doing what I'm doing -- Chantal Kreviazuk
A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality -- Yoko Ono
The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
As I get older I'm more and more comfortable being alone -- Sienna Miller
Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much -- Helen Keller
Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light -- Helen Keller
The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want -- Justin Timberlake
The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself -- Douglas Coupland
It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company -- George Washington
What a lovely surprise to finally discover how unlonely being alone can be -- Ellen Burstyn
Justice cannot be for one side alone, but must be for both -- Eleanor Roosevelt
It's better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone - so far -- Marilyn Monroe
Being alone is very difficult -- Yoko Ono
When everything is lonely I can be my best friend -- Conor Oberst
I restore myself when I'm alone -- Marilyn Monroe
The strong man is strongest when alone -- Friedrich Schiller
The lonely become either thoughtful or empty -- Mason Cooley
We are all born alone and die alone. The loneliness is definitely part of the journey of life -- Jenova Chen
Without a family, man, alone in the world, trembles with the cold -- Andre Maurois
A hospital alone shows what war is -- Erich Maria Remarque
No one can arrive from being talented alone, work transforms talent into genius -- Anna Pavlova
Reason is a crutch for age, but youth is strong enough to walk alone -- John Dryden
We learn about life not from plusses alone, but from minuses as well -- Anton Chekhov
Thank you for leaving us alone but giving us enough attention to boost our egos -- Mick Jagger
He travels the fastest who travels alone -- Rudyard Kipling
If you make friends with yourself you will never be alone -- Maxwell Maltz
Artists walk alone -- Ezra Miller
I just always wanted to be left alone to go into a creative space -- Randy Quaid
Your actions, and your action alone, determines your worth -- Evelyn Waugh
All of our unhappiness comes from our inability to be alone -- Jean de la Bruyere
If you're going to put yourself above everybody else, you might end up alone -- Joseph Gordon-Levitt
To be adult is to be alone -- Jean Rostand
The unconditional love for you child, it's truly amazing -- Jourdan Dunn
It's amazing what you'll discover if you start exploring what God has placed within you -- Victoria Osteen
When you're true to who you are, amazing things happen -- Deborah Norville
It is amazing how nice people are to you when they know you're going away --Michael Arlen
Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen -- Conan O'Brien
I love being on tour; I love being on the road. It's the most amazing feeling ever. I live for it; I love it -- Kat Graham
Count your blessings. You are one of a kind. There's no one in the world like you. You are amazing -- Richard Simmons
It is amazing how complete is the delusion that beauty is goodness -- Leo Tolstoy
It's the most amazing feeling to hold your child in your arms -- Chris O'Donnell
It's amazing living alone. I'm very lucky. It's like a refuge -- Paloma Faith
I think having children is the most amazing thing -- Rachel Stevens
It's an amazing feeling to go into a studio and really be alone -- Joaquin Phoenix
Travel around the world is amazing. New people. New-found family, really -- Dhani Jones
Motherhood is a dream. It really is absolutely amazing -- Jessica Simpson
Failure is an amazing data point that tells you which direction not to go -- Payal Kadakia
Exercise is amazing, from the inside out. I feel so alive and have more energy -- Vanessa Hudgens
I think there's nothing more amazing than helping people every day -- Naomie Harris
Propaganda is amazing. People can be led to believe anything -- Alice Walker
It's amazing how stress keeps you trim -- Peter Andre
We boil at different degrees -- Clint Eastwood
Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret -- Laurence J. Peter
For every minute you remain angry, you give up sixty seconds of peace of mind -- Ralph Waldo Emerson
A man who has never made a woman angry is a failure in life -- Christopher Morley
People won't have time for you if you are always angry or complaining -- Stephen Hawking
I don't usually lose my temper, but if I get angry, it's true - I'm scary -- Eva Mendes
Silence is one of the hardest arguments to refute -- Josh Billings
To be angry is to revenge the faults of others on ourselves -- Alexander Pope
While seeking revenge, dig two graves - one for yourself -- Douglas Horton
He who angers you conquers you -- Elizabeth Kenny
When angry count to ten before you speak. If very angry, count to one hundred -- Thomas Jefferson
Anger and intolerance are the enemies of correct understanding -- Mahatma Gandhi
Anger is the enemy of non-violence and pride is a monster that swallows it up -- Mahatma Gandhi
When angry, count to four; when very angry, swear -- Mark Twain
Grab the broom of anger and drive off the beast of fear -- Zora Neale Hurston
When one burns one's bridges, what a very nice fire it makes -- Dylan Thomas
The opposite of anger is not calmness, its empathy -- Mehmet Oz
Sometimes, you have to get angry to get things done -- Ang Lee
Getting angry doesn't solve anything -- Grace Kelly
Let us not look back in anger, nor forward in fear, but around in awareness -- James Thurber
Anger cannot be dishonest -- Marcus Aurelius
A man that does not know how to be angry does not know how to be good -- Henry Ward Beecher
If you get down and quarell everyday, you're saying prayers to the devil, I say -- Bob Marley
Sometimes it's worse to win a fight than to lose -- Billie Holiday
A hungry man is an angry one -- Buchi Emecheta
Denial, panic, threats, anger - those are very human responses to feeling guilt -- Joshua Oppenheimer
Never go to bed angry, stay up and fight -- William Congreve
The best remedy for a short temper is a long walk -- Joseph Joubert
Be modest, humble, simple. Control your anger -- Abraham Cahan
The greatest remedy for anger is delay -- Lucius Annaeus Seneca
Never do anything when you are in a temper, for you will do everything wrong -- Baltasar Gracian
Whatever is begun in anger ends in shame -- Benjamin Franklin
Getting angry doesn't solve anything -- Grace Kelly
There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved -- George Sand
Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me -- Carol Burnet
Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it -- Charles R. Swindoll
The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it -- Hubert H. Humphrey
Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life -- Omar Khayyam
Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive -- Elbert Hubbard
Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life -- Confucius
Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful -- Thich Nhat Hanh
The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it -- Hubert H. Humphrey
Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace -- Christie Brinkley
Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness -- Euripides
Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light -- Helen Keller
There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship -- Thomas Aquinas
My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me -- Henry Ford
Friends are the siblings God never gave us --Mencius
Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive -- Elbert Hubbard
To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone -- Reba McEntire
Life would be tragic if it weren't funny -- Stephen Hawking
Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese -- Luis Bunuel
My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them -- Mitch Hedberg
The most important thing in the world is family and love -- John Wooden
You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them -- Desmond Tutu
Family is not an important thing. It's everything -- Michael J. Fox
The family is one of nature's masterpieces -- George Santayana
I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you -- Joyce Meyer
To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there -- Barbara Bush
Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love -- Mother Teresa
Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life -- Yoko Ono
Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace -- Christie Brinkley
Smile, it is the key that fits the lock of everybody's heart -- Anthony J. D'Angelo
The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection -- Thomas Paine
